activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: Always switch off the main p'ow'er.
He usually connects the gr'ou'nd wire properly.
A strange s'ou'nd is coming from this motor right now.
There was a short circuit after the sh'ow'er.

activity_2.focus: Focus Contrast between the Simple Present Tense and the Present Continuous Tense

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Read the answer and use the pause to ask the correct question. Then compare your response with the model question.
 පිළිතුර කියවා නිවැරදි ප්‍රශ්නය ඇසීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න. ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
 பதிலைக் கவனமாக வாசித்து, இடைவெளியில் சரியான கேள்வியை கேளுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் கேள்வியை மாதிரி கேள்வியுடன் ஒப்பிடவும்.

tables: I am crying because I am sad.
I always cry when I am sad.

example_dialogues.text_a: Why are you drinking king coconut?
example_dialogues.text_b: I am drinking it because I am dehydrated.
example_dialogues.text_c: I always drink it when I am dehydrated.

example_dialogues.text_a: Why are you biting your lips?
example_dialogues.text_b: I am biting them because I’m nervous.
example_dialogues.text_c: I always bite my lips when I am nervous.

example_dialogues.text_b: I am lying down because I am exhausted.
example_dialogues.text_c: I always lie down when I am exhausted.

dialogues.text_a: Why are you switching off the main power?
dialogues.text_b: I’m switching it off because I need to fix a wire.
dialogues.text_c: I always switch it off before starting any work.

dialogues.text_a: Why are you checking the fuse?
dialogues.text_b: I’m checking it because the lights are off.
dialogues.text_c: I always check it when the lights go off.

dialogues.text_a: Why are you connecting the tester?
dialogues.text_b: I’m connecting it because I must check the voltage.
dialogues.text_c: I always connect it before touching a wire.

dialogues.text_a: Why are you wearing rubber gloves?
dialogues.text_b: I’m wearing them because I am repairing sockets.
dialogues.text_c: I always wear them when I repair sockets.

dialogues.text_a: Why are you replacing the bulb?
dialogues.text_b: I’m replacing it because it’s burnt out.
dialogues.text_c: I always replace bulbs when they are burnt out.

dialogues.text_a: Why are you labelling the wires?
dialogues.text_b: I’m labelling them because it will avoid confusion.
dialogues.text_c: I always label them after installation.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

content.sentence_1: The baby ______ because it is hungry.
content.sentence_2: It always ______ when it is hungry.
content.full_sentance: The baby is crying because it is hungry. It always cries when it is hungry.

content.sentence_2: She always ______ when she is angry.
content.full_sentance: She is screaming because she is angry. She always screams when she is angry.

content.sentence_2: They always ______ when they are cold.
content.full_sentance: They are shivering because they are cold. They always shiver when they are cold.

content.sentence_1: He ______ his nails because he is nervous.
content.sentence_2: He always ______ his nails when he is nervous.
content.full_sentance: He is biting his nails because he is nervous. He always bites his nails when he is nervous.

content.sentence_1: She ______ her eyes because she is scared.
content.sentence_2: She always ______ her eyes when she is scared.
content.full_sentance: She is closing her eyes because she is scared. She always closes her eyes when she is scared.

content.sentence_1: The trainees ______ because they are hot.
content.sentence_2: They always ______ when they are hot.
content.full_sentance: The trainees are sweating because they are hot. They always sweat when they are hot.

activity_b.text: The baby is crying because it is hungry. It always cries when it is hungry.
She is screaming because she is angry. She always screams when she is angry.
They are shivering because they are cold. They always shiver when they are cold.
He is biting his nails because he is nervous. He always bites his nails when he is nervous.
She is closing her eyes because she is scared. She always closes her eyes when she is scared.
The trainees are sweating because they are hot. They always sweat when they are hot.

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: Why is Ramesh starting work earlier today?
Questions.answer: Because the electrical inspector is visiting
options: Because the electrical inspector is visiting
Because there is a power cut

Questions.question: Why is he preparing the transformer kit?
Questions.answer: Because the instructor is demonstrating insulation testing
options: Because the old one is damaged
Because the instructor is demonstrating insulation testing
Because the instructor is demonstrating installing a circuit breaker

Questions.question: Why is he sharing tools with Nalin?
Questions.answer: Because his tool bag is being checked for safety
options: Because his tool bag is being checked for safety
Because Nalin’s tool bag is being checked for safety

Questions.question: Why is he wearing a full apron today?
Questions.answer: Because he is handling live wires
options: Because he is handling live wires
Because it is the final exam

Questions.question: Why is he checking the fuse box this afternoon?
options: Because it is part of the cleaning routine
Because the instructor told him to test the lights

activity_b.text: Ramesh works in the Electrical Workshop at the TVET Institute in Galle.
He starts work at eight o’clock every morning, but today he is starting earlier because the electrical inspector is visiting.
He usually begins his day by checking the multimeter readings, but this morning he is preparing the transformer kit because the instructor is demonstrating how to test insulation.
He normally uses his own pliers and screwdriver set, but today he is sharing tools with his classmate Nalin because his tool bag is being checked for safety.
He always wears rubber gloves and safety shoes, but now he is wearing a full protective apron because he is handling live wires.
Most days, Ramesh installs switches and connects wiring, but this week he is replacing fuse holders in the lighting panel.
He usually checks the control panel with the instructor, but today he is inspecting it by himself as the inspector is busy with some other trainees.
He normally has a colleague to assist him but today they are all busy getting things ready for the electrical inspector’s visit.
At the end of the day, he always switches off the main supply, but this afternoon he is checking the fuse box because one circuit keeps tripping.
